mapper.sql: id as id, account_id as accountId, behavior_section as behaviorSection, duration_section as durationSection, creator_id as creatorId, creator_name as creatorName, create_time as createTime, last_modifier_id as lastModifierId, last_modifier_name as lastModifierName, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, is_delete as isDelete
mapper.insert: insert into drt_monitor_behavior_duration (id, account_id, behavior_section, duration_section, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, last_modifier_id, last_modifier_name, last_modify_time, is_delete) values (#{id}, #{accountId}, #{behaviorSection}, #{durationSection}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifierId}, #{lastModifierName}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{isDelete})

insert into drt_monitor_behavior_duration (id, account_id, behavior_section, duration_section, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, last_modifier_id, last_modifier_name, last_modify_time, is_delete) values
(#{item.id},#{item.accountId},#{item.behaviorSection},#{item.durationSection},#{item.creatorId},#{item.creatorName},#{item.createTime},#{item.lastModifierId}, #{item.lastModifierName}, #{item.lastModifyTime}, '1')
